title: provisionals...
body: what is the point in winning 7/10 provisionals if i get the exact same rank as last season?

replies.body: Chances are your MMR was a tier or two below your rank and placements brought it up a little.
better than losing 7/10 and dropping isn't it.
Exactly what happened to me. And I won my first 5 matches as well
Yeah the season 5 ranked system has changed. If you read about the new season seeding you should have been expecting this.
Atleast you weren't Diam+ meaning you'll 100% get lower than what you were last season.
TBH/ comparatively that's a good placement compared to what I've read a lot of people are doing.
So you don't end up a lower rank then last season?
